mapper.select: select pg.post_no, ui.nickname, pc.post_catename, pg.subject, pg.writedate from post_group pg left join post_category pc on pg.post_catecode = pc.post_catecode left join user_info ui on pg.userid = ui.userid where pg.group_no = #{group_no}
(SELECT group_no, group_name, group_img, content FROM group_info WHERE enabled = 1 LIMIT 10) order by rand();

select gi.group_no, gi.group_name, gi.group_img, gi.content from user_info u left join user_interest ui on #{userid} = ui.userid join group_info gi on ui.s_catecode = gi.s_catecode left join ( select group_no, count(post_no)as cnt from post_group group by group_no )pg on gi.group_no = pg.group_no order by pg.cnt desc limit 5

select gi.group_no, gi.group_name, gi.group_img, gi.content from user_info u left join group_info gi on #{first_area} = gi.area_code or #{second_area} = gi.area_code left join ( select group_no, count(post_no)as cnt from post_group group by group_no )pg on gi.group_no = pg.group_no order by pg.cnt desc limit 5

select gi.group_no, gi.group_name from user_info u left join group_user_role gur on u.userid = gur.userid left join group_info gi on gur.group_no = gi.group_no where u.enabled = 1 and u.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into group_info (userid, group_name, group_img, content, area_code, s_catecode) values (#{userid}, #{group_name}, #{group_img}, #{content}, #{area_code}, #{s_catecode})
